location.permission.deniedMessage: Location access denied. Please enable it in your device settings to use prayer times.
location.permission.description: This app requires location access to provide accurate prayer times based on your current location. Please enable location services in your device settings.
location.permission.title: Location Permission Required
location.settings.keepLocationUpdated.in: This feature checks your location when the app opens and suggests updating your prayer times if your city has changed. This helps ensure you always have accurate prayer times for your current location.
